Sentencas: This paper presents a novel hybrid aircraft propulsion system that combines a turbojet engine with an ammonia decomposition reactor and a solid oxide fuel cell system, where the compressor is driven by a solid oxide fuel cell instead of a turbine.
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels

Sentencas: Ammonia and methane are selected as alternative fuels to replace kerosene.
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels

Sentencas: Technical analyses, including energy and exergy analyses, and comprehensive parametric studies, including engine, flight, fuel cell, and decomposition parameters, are performed, together with quantification of global warming potential (GWP).
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels

Sentencas: The results show that the solid oxide fuel cell has a power of 316.68 kW and an electrical efficiency of 42.09%.
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels

Sentencas: The hybrid aircraft propulsion system has a thrust of 851.82 N, a specific fuel consumption of 49.93 g/(kN.s) and an exergy efficiency of 22.27%.
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels

Sentencas: Compared to a kerosene-fueled turbojet, the hybrid aircraft propulsion system can decease 80.37% of GWP.
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels

Sentencas: The optimum choice of engine parameters is a low fuel ratio, a medium pressure ratio and a high air ratio.
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels

Sentencas: The best choice of flight parameters is a high Mach number and a medium altitude.
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels

Sentencas: Fuel cell parameters cannot achieve high thrusts and low fuel consumptions at the same time.
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels

Sentencas: The decomposition temperature should be as high as possible.
Titulo: Comprehensive technical analyses of a solid oxide fuel cell turbine-less hybrid aircraft propulsion system using ammonia and methane as alternative fuels
